mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(REQ_NO, -4))), 0) AS MAX_NUMBER FROM HR_OFFAPPLY_MST_X10005 WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(REQ_NO, 4, 4)) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(REQ_NO, 8, 2)) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(REQ_NO, 10, 2)) = EXTRACT(DAY FROM SYSDATE)

SELECT EMP_NO, KOR_NM, PSTN_CD, OGRP_CD, BIZAREA_CD, BIZAREA_NM, ORG, POSI_CD, GRP_NM, DEPT_NM, DEPT_CD, PATH FROM ( SELECT HEM.EMP_NO EMP_NO, HEM.KOR_NM KOR_NM, HEM.PSTN_CD PSTN_CD, HEM.OGRP_CD OGRP_CD, HEM.BIZAREA_CD BIZAREA_CD, MBM.BIZAREA_NM BIZAREA_NM, COMET.FN_HR_UP_DEPT_NM2(HEM.COMPANY_CD, HEM.DEPT_CD, SYSDATE) AS ORG, HEM.POSI_CD POSI_CD, MGM.GRP_NM GRP_NM, MDM.DEPT_NM DEPT_NM, MDM.DEPT_CD DEPT_CD, MDM.DEPT_START_DT DEPT_START_DT, ORG_TB.PATH PATH FROM HR_EMP_MST HEM JOIN MA_BIZAREA_MST MBM ON HEM.COMPANY_CD = MBM.COMPANY_CD AND HEM.BIZAREA_CD = MBM.BIZAREA_CD JOIN MA_GROUP_MST MGM ON HEM.COMPANY_CD = MGM.COMPANY_CD AND MGM.MENUGRP_CD = HEM.BIZAREA_CD JOIN MA_DEPT_MST MDM ON HEM.COMPANY_CD = MDM.COMPANY_CD AND HEM.DEPT_CD = MDM.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.DEPT_NM || '/' || B.DEPT_NM || '/' || A.DEPT_NM AS PATH, A.DEPT_START_DT DEPT_START_DT, A.DEPT_CD DEPT_CD FROM MA_DEPT_MST A LEFT JOIN MA_DEPT_MST B ON A.UP_DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND B.COMPANY_CD = A.COMPANY_CD LEFT JOIN MA_DEPT_MST C ON B.UP_DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND C.COMPANY_CD = A.COMPANY_CD WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = #{P_COMPANY_CD} ) ORG_TB ON HEM.DEPT_CD = ORG_TB.DEPT_CD WHERE HEM.COMPANY_CD = #{P_COMPANY_CD} AND HEM.EMP_NO = #{P_EMP_NO} ORDER BY DEPT_START_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT HOMX.COMPANY_CD, HOMX.REQ_NO, HOMX.REQ_DT, HOMX.DNLGB_CD, HOMX.DNL_CD, HOMX.START_DT, HOMX.END_DT, HOMX.BIZAREA_CD, HOMX.ATHZ_DOC_CD, HOMX.ATHZ_ST_CD, HOMX.REQ_EMP_NO, HEM2.REQ_KOR_NM, HOMX.REASON_DC, HEM.EMP_NO, HEM.KOR_NM, HEM.PSTN_CD, HEM.OGRP_CD, HEM.DEPT_CD, (SELECT COMET.FN_HR_UP_DEPT_NM2(HEM.COMPANY_CD, HEM.DEPT_CD , SYSDATE) FROM DUAL) AS ORG, HEM.POSI_CD FROM HR_OFFAPPLY_MST_X10005 HOMX LEFT JOIN HR_EMP_MST HEM ON HOMX.COMPANY_CD = HEM.COMPANY_CD AND HOMX.EMP_NO = HEM.EMP_NO AND HOMX.DEPT_CD = HEM.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMPANY_CD, DEPT_CD, EMP_NO, KOR_NM REQ_KOR_NM FROM HR_EMP_MST) HEM2 ON HOMX.COMPANY_CD = HEM2.COMPANY_CD AND HOMX.REQ_EMP_NO = HEM2.EMP_NO AND HOMX.DEPT_CD = HEM2.DEPT_CD WHERE HOMX.DNLGB_CD = '400' AND HOMX.COMPANY_CD = #{P_COMPANY_CD} AND HOMX.REQ_NO = #{P_REQ_NO}

SELECT HOMX.COMPANY_CD, HOMX.REQ_NO, HOMX.REQ_DT, HOMX.DNLGB_CD, HOMX.DNL_CD, HOMX.START_DT, HOMX.END_DT, HOMX.BIZAREA_CD, HOMX.ATHZ_DOC_CD, HOMX.ATHZ_ST_CD, HOMX.REQ_EMP_NO, HEM2.REQ_KOR_NM, HOMX.REASON_DC, HEM.EMP_NO, HEM.KOR_NM, HEM.PSTN_CD, HEM.OGRP_CD, HEM.DEPT_CD, (SELECT COMET.FN_HR_UP_DEPT_NM2(HEM.COMPANY_CD, HEM.DEPT_CD , SYSDATE) FROM DUAL) AS ORG, HEM.POSI_CD FROM HR_OFFAPPLY_MST_X10005 HOMX LEFT JOIN HR_EMP_MST HEM ON HOMX.COMPANY_CD = HEM.COMPANY_CD AND HOMX.EMP_NO = HEM.EMP_NO AND HOMX.DEPT_CD = HEM.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMPANY_CD, DEPT_CD, EMP_NO, KOR_NM REQ_KOR_NM FROM HR_EMP_MST) HEM2 ON HOMX.COMPANY_CD = HEM2.COMPANY_CD AND HOMX.REQ_EMP_NO = HEM2.EMP_NO AND HOMX.DEPT_CD = HEM2.DEPT_CD WHERE HOMX.DNLGB_CD = '400' AND HOMX.COMPANY_CD = #{P_COMPANY_CD}
AND END_DT BETWEEN #{P_START_DT} AND #{P_END_DT}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, COUNT(*) AS COUNT_PER_MONTH FROM HR_OFFAPPLY_MST_X10005 WHERE TO_DATE(START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND COMPANY_CD = #{P_COMPANY_CD} AND DEPT_CD = #{P_DEPT_CD} AND BIZAREA_CD = #{P_BIZAREA_CD} AND DNLGB_CD = 400 AND ATHZ_ST_CD = 4 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM')

WITH DateRange AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D'), '월요일'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS StartOfWeek, TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 4, '금요일'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS EndOfWeek FROM DUAL ) SELECT o.REQ_NO, o.START_DT, o.END_DT FROM HR_OFFAPPLY_MST_X10005 o JOIN DateRange dr ON
TO_DATE(o.START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_DATE(dr.EndOfWeek, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(o.END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(dr.StartOfWeek, 'YYYYMMDD')
